name: Skeleton and Spirit
description:
Art, code, and music made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021 - Joined Together.

Guide a skeleton and spirit, who are tethered together by a soul chain, through a dungeon. Avoid mystical fires that will break their soul chain while collecting keys to progress through levels.

Controls: WASD to move the skeleton, Mouse to move the spirit.

Art/Design/Code by Andrew Chen

Music by Patrick Chen
